articles.description: The comparison found that the rate of glacial retreat in Greenland during the 21st century has been twice as fast as the retreat in the 20th century.
articles.content: When Laura Larocca visited Denmark in 2019, the climate scientist sifted through thousands of old aerial photographs of Greenlands icy coastline, which were rediscovered in a castle outside Copenhage… [+2606 chars]
